name: LaToya Ward
introduction: LaToya Ward, a versatile actress and filmmaker originally from Texas now residing in Los Angeles, is recognized for her Win as Best Actress in a Feature Film at the London International Film Festival. LaToya has auditioned in front of media moguls such as Tyler Perry and selected as a Winner in the TJMS Talent Search for a walk on role on Tyler Perry's, If Loving You Is Wrong! LaToya also won Best Actress in a TV Sitcom and was a Finalist in "Who Wants to be a Soap Star Live" Competition!LaToya is an emerging filmmaker, writing and producing films and media content which has premiered at film festivals around the world. Through her company, Toy Vision Entertainment, she has created a lineup of cutting edge stories that have entertained and inspired viewers of all ages.Booking LaToya Ward can be the biggest and brightest decision made for your brand and/or company. With over 2 million global followers, LaToya's influence spans from fitness and fashion to inspiration and commitment.
